segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is turning into a disgusting mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing with who knows what in that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling all over the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing right in it, soaking her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not smell or hear that sloshing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are adding to the filth by climbing around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool in the wet spotâ€”it's going to slide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's hand in the cookie jar after all this? Gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies mixing with puddle water nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, probably tracking dirt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is sloppy and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden can't save this from being nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't step foot in there right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
